name: Shazam
description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com

api_methods.name: songs/get-count
api_methods.description: Get total times the specific song is detected/shazamed by using .../songs/detect or .../songs/v2/detect endpoint

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key field returned from .../songs/detect or .../search endpoint

utterances.utterance: How many times has the song with key 40333609 been shazamed?
Can you tell me the total shazams for the song identified by key 12345678?
I want to know the shazam count for the track with key 98765432.
What's the detection count for the song with key 11223344?
Find out how many times the song with key 55667788 has been identified.
Get the total number of shazams for the song with key 66778899.
How often has the song with key 99887766 been detected?
Check the shazam count for the song with key 33445566.
What is the total detection count for the song with key 44556677?
Tell me how many times the song with key 22334455 has been shazamed.
